summary: better texture for the thieves guild armor imo............
descriptionHtml:
Thieves Guild Retextures

Description;

Wasn\'t pleased with the vanilla thieves guild armor for the player and i cannot mod so I found this nice retext for the leather armor thus used that retext for the thieves guild armor. all credit goes to scot\'s mod called Leather replacement... 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4031
who made this great texture, all i did was to use it for the vanilla thieves guild armor instead, while not messing with the leather armor.

this mod replaces (for both male and female);
thieves guild armor
thieves guild gloves
thieves guild boots
(does not replace the thieves guild hood)

Installation (Manual): 
- Download the main file 
- Open the main archive and move the textures, meshes, to Skyrim data directory. (These are all the files required)  (just follow the file path)
   c;\\program files\\the elder scrolls v skyrim\\data

Uninstallation (Manual):
- Remove the textures, meshes
- Meshes\\Armor\\thievesguild and textures\\Armor\\thievesguild folder

Have not had any bugs/issues but if there are comment, i am new to modding so dont expect miracle fixes.

Comment, endorse its all good, All THANKS GOES TO scot

You may use this mod so long as you mention it origins and creators.
author: davnat and scot
